effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your Sinister Strike, Pistol Shot, and Ambush have a 35% chance to Ethereal Rampage, dealing 30% increased damage as Shadow.
(4) Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,063 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 596 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
